name: Gin Rummy by Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Gim Rummy on your iPad, iPhone, or iPod.

Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. Gin Rummy is a 2 player game played with a regular pack of 52 cards. The goal is to score more points than the computer opponent. This is a fast paced game. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

This game is best played on tablet devices.

Features:

* Real Gin Rummy rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
